Info.StakeSent: Ваши MNTP токены заморожены в Ethereum пуле и выпущены в блокчейне Mint

GeneralInfo.Heading: Общая информация
GeneralInfo.Text:
You should have at least 10 000. 1 MNTP tokens for the masternode launch. By launching your own node in MINT blockchain you'll be able to receive a fee from GOLD transactions. Few steps that will be required for masternode launch:

1. Join the pool with your MNTP tokens.
2. Install Goldmint Wallet extension for your browser.
3. Freeze your MNTP stake in the pool and receive MNT tokens to your Goldmint Wallet.
4. Deploy a cloud server.
5. Setup a mastednode.
6. Send MNT from Goldmint Wallet to master node Wallet.

Detailed instructions you can find below.

BuyMNTP.Heading: MNTP
BuyMNTP.Description: BUY MNTP новый текст: `MINT is an open blockchain network based on the Proof-of-Stake algorithm. Technically, the data is transferred to the blockchain from the pawn shops accounting system or Custody Bot send it automatically. After the pawnshop Operator/Custody Bot evaluates the customer's product and enters it into the pawnshop's database, the relevant information is recorded in the blockchain. In order to use network, pawnshops pay a commission for transactions, part of these commissions are received by the holders of MNTP tokens for storing data and participating in transaction verification. The reward is paid in an internal system in GOLD coins. To get the reward, token holders must launch the Master Node of the MINT blockchain – at least 10,000 MNTP tokens are needed.

Items.1th: Low commission for GOLD coin transaction (when you send GOLD tokens on a MINT blockchain)
Items.2th: Zero commission for GOLD/ETH exchange (when you sell or buy GOLD for Ethereum)
Items.3th: Also, MNTP tokens are used to pay for recording any data in the MINT blockchain

BuyMNTP.BuyText: Token MNTP listed on Coinmarketcap and traded on several exchanges:
BuyMNTP.MNTPRepresented: Also MNTP represented on Etherama smart contract platform, on which are frozen 2M tokens.

ConnectionError.Title: Ошибка подключения
ConnectionError.Message:
Похоже, что ваше интернет-соединение не установлено.
Пожалуйста, проверьте его и повторите попытку.

MetaMask.Heading: Требуется MetaMask
MetaMask.Text: MetaMask - это мост, который позволяет вам посещать распределенную сеть будущего в вашем браузере сегодня. Он позволяет запускать Ethereum dApps прямо в вашем браузере без запуска полного узла Ethereum. Пожалуйста, установите расширение MetaMask в браузере Chrome, Firefox или Opera. Узнать о Metamask

LiteWallet.Heading: Lite Wallet
LiteWallet.Text: Lite Wallet предоставлен для безопасного хранения, отправки или получения токенов MNT или GOLD. Это позволит вам иметь несколько кошельков для хранения MNT/GOLD. Получить
